about_the_game:
Get a taste of what life is like as a helpful guardian grape! This demo is a vignette that showcases a concentrated slice of what the full version of Garden Story will have to offer when it releases.

Elderberry has left the restoration of Autumn Town in the capable hands of Concord, Fuji, and Rana. In this demo:

  • Wander Autumn Town: Autumn Town still has a few residents remaining, like Dillford and Ama. Find them and see how Concord can help.
  • Investigate the sewers: Seek out the mysteries within the sewers of Autumn Town, but be careful! Rumors of Rot mean it may be precarious….
  • Revive the Collection: Collecting resources will begin the Archive Restoration, restoring valuable information Fuji can use to build the community.
  • Get cozy: Let the sound of the rain and your own sense of time guide how quickly you’d like to take this journey. Explore at your own pace.
detailed_description:
Get a taste of what life is like as a helpful guardian grape! This demo is a vignette that showcases a concentrated slice of what the full version of Garden Story will have to offer when it releases.

Elderberry has left the restoration of Autumn Town in the capable hands of Concord, Fuji, and Rana. In this demo:

  • Wander Autumn Town: Autumn Town still has a few residents remaining, like Dillford and Ama. Find them and see how Concord can help.
  • Investigate the sewers: Seek out the mysteries within the sewers of Autumn Town, but be careful! Rumors of Rot mean it may be precarious….
  • Revive the Collection: Collecting resources will begin the Archive Restoration, restoring valuable information Fuji can use to build the community.
  • Get cozy: Let the sound of the rain and your own sense of time guide how quickly you’d like to take this journey. Explore at your own pace.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Garden Story: Autumn Town Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews:
“It's clear the world of Garden Story is rich with potential.”
Gamespot

“While the art style, clever puzzles, and wonderful writing do a lot to carry the cheerful mood, it's building up a community of friends that feels the most rewarding.”
US Gamer

“With a boatload of lovable characters, cute graphics and a hero that serves as a role model for the unspoken, Garden Story has a lot to appreciate.”
Big Boss Battle
short_description: Welcome to Autumn Town! In this standalone demo, Concord must begin the task of restoring the once-prosperous Autumn Town with their friends, Rana and Fuji. Gather resources, create literature, and delve into the mysterious sewers to help begin the restoration of the once-thriving community.
